segments.text: How many hours do you work a week ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I do a forty-hour week . I â€™ m on flexi-time . I usually start work at 8 a . m . and finish at 4
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And how many weeks holiday do you get a year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Four - plus public holidays . I usually take two weeks off in the summer and the rest at New Year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , if we're busy . I'm paid double-time if I work at weekends .
segments.speaker: S2
